description: GIT 14 drop is the high quality digestive drops composed and prepared with best quality herbal extract and oil extracted from the fresh herbs under hygienic condition, strictly accordance with Vedic principles.
productfeatures:

DOSAGE: 5-10 drops twice a day with water or as directed by physician.

description: Rjuv9 Tooth concentrate is a concentrated formula developed from scientifically researched herbal extracts & herbal oil which helps to improve oral health, strengthen the gums, remove bad odours, remove plaque & overcome tooth sensitivity problems.
productfeatures:
Rjuv9 Tooth concentrate is a concentrated formula developed from scientifically researched herbal extracts & herbal oil which helps to improve oral health, strengthen the gums, remove bad odours, remove plaque & overcome tooth sensitivity problems. rjuv9 Tooth Concentrate is highly economical as a small bottle of 15mL offers almost 225 dosages. Herbal extracts & herbal oil helps to improve the pH of the saliva, so as to overcome teeth & whole mouth related problems. We suggest you to do brushing at bedtime also, as it is much necessary compared to in the morning brushing.

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Ritha (Sapindus trifoliatus) Ext., Tomar (Zanthoxylum armatum) Seeds Ext., Dant Prabhakar Manjan Powder, Kapurdhara Ark Liquid, Lavangadi Gutika Powder, Khadiradi Bati Powder, Panchgun Oil.

DOSAGE: Pour 2 drops on a wet toothbrush & continue brushing as usual or as directed by a physician.

STORAGE:Store in a cool, dry & hygiene place.

BENEFITS:
  • Helps to improve oral health
  • Strengthen the gums
  • Helps to remove bad odours & plaque
  • Helps to overcome tooth sensitivity problems
